summary: A young woman's penchant for sensational Gothic novels leads to misunderstandings in the matters of the heart.
cast: Geraldine James|Michael Judd|Julia Dearden|Gerry O'Brien|Felicity Jones|David Brittain|Patrick Ryan|Sylvestra Le Touzel|Desmond Barrit|David Sheehan|William Beck|Liam McMahon|Mal Whyte|JJ Feild|Myles Breen|Bernadette McKenna|Carey Mulligan|Shauna Taylor|Sophie Vavasseur|Hugh O'Conor|Catherine Walker|Liam Cunningham|Anne Fitzpatrick|Ryan O'Connor|Mark Dymond|Pauline Cadell|Alana Brennan|Ella Clifton|Edie Davis|Jamie Gogan|Megan McLoughlin|Charlotte O'Reilly|Cian Porteus|Judy Chetner|Peter Dillon|Judy Donovan|Giedrius Nagys
title: La abadía de Northanger
